videos.headline: UIC hits buzzer-beating game-winning 3 in OT
videos.description: Travell Washington of UIC hits a 3-pointer as time expires in overtime and the Flames go on to defeat Wright State 75-72.

article.description: Travell Washington scored 13 points Friday night and hit the winning 3-pointer with a second left in overtime to help Illinois-Chicago beat Wright State 75-72 in the Horizon League opener for both teams.

video.title: UIC hits buzzer-beating game-winning 3 in OT

article.headline: Travell Washington's 3 lifts UIC over Wright State

images.name: UIC hits buzzer-beating game-winning 3 in OT
images.caption: Travell Washington of UIC hits a 3-pointer as time expires in overtime and the Flames go on to defeat Wright State 75-72.

article.linkText: Travell Washington's 3 lifts UIC over Wright State
article.story: DAYTON, Ohio -- Travell Washington scored 13 points Friday night and hit the winning 3-pointer with a second left in overtime to help Illinois-Chicago beat Wright State 75-72 in the Horizon League opener for both teams. Marcus Ottey had 23 points and eight rebounds, and Tarkus Ferguson added 18 points, 10 rebounds and six assists for the Flames (7-7). Cole Gentry had eight of his 24 points in overtime for Wright State (6-8). His 3-pointer with eight seconds left in the extra period tied it at 72 before Washington's winner. Neither team led by more than three in the extra period. Ottey's jumper with 1:13 left tied it at 67, Ferguson's 3-pointer at 45 seconds made it 70-67 and the Flames never trailed again. Wright State led 57-52 with 2:28 left in the second half and UIC closed the period on a 7-2 run to force overtime. Mark Hughes and Alan Vest had 11 points each for the Raiders.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
